name: liquid cohesion
description: @michaelalstad One of the digital layers of Liquid Cohesion - a choreographed interactive video projection that transformed a water feature in Toronto’s financial district into a utopian aquatic playground through blending footage of swimming figures with a diverse array of marine life. The work was projected from an office tower down onto a large shallow circular pool surface creating an open-ended virtual aquarium. Participants movement along the video projection’s perimeter activated an animation layer suggesting fish swarm behaviour and emergent patterns in nature.
